page.title: 01General Description.
page.content: General Description of area. The square is mostly countryside which is very hilly. The highest hill is 216 feet. There are a number of tracks leading into the hills. There are some woods; more coniferous than deciduous. On the high ground, there are sheep; with cattle and crops on the low ground. There are 2 small villages and 8 farms. On the eastern side of our area is the main road from Dundee to Kirkcaldy. The main village is Letham. Many people who live in the area commute to the nearby towns and cities.
